snippet: Hackers rigged the Web site of the Central Tibetan Administration to infect the computers of Chinese-speaking visitors with rogue software, a researcher said Tuesday.
abstract: Hackers rig Web site of Tibet’s government in exile to infect computers of Chinese-speaking visitors with virus, latest in series of cyberattacks aimed at activists from Himalayan region of China.
lead_paragraph: Hackers rigged the Web site of the Central Tibetan Administration to infect the computers of Chinese-speaking visitors with rogue software, a researcher said Tuesday.

headline.main: India: Hackers Attack Web Site of Tibetan Government in Exile
headline.print_headline: India: Hackers Attack Web Site Of Tibetan Government in Exile
